availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Harrison P. Smith (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elivra Love Smith in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on August 21, 1848. Father of Sarah Ellen Smith, William Robert Smith, Harrison Sanford Smith, Lilly Love Smith, Young Smith, and Idah Smith. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 383B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 700.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 3, p. 80A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film 000851644.
"Harrison Pitney Smith (1824-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial 27990210, accessed January 23, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/27990210.
